data.title: Sebastiano Timpanaro The Genesis of Lachmann S Method PDF
data.meta_description: 342226356-Sebastiano-Timpanaro-The-Genesis-of-Lachmann-s-Method.pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides biographical information about Sebastiano Timpanaro and discusses the context in which he wrote The Genesis of Lachmann's Method. It notes that Timpanaro was an influential 20th century Italian intellectual in the fields of classics, history, and Marxist and Freudian theory. His father taught physics and directed the Dormus Galilaeana research institute. Timpanaro was introduced to the intellectual atmosphere of the Scuola Normale Superiore of Pisa. The introduction provides background on Timpanaro and the context for his writing on the history of textual criticism.
